+======================================================================+

Introduction
------------

This package contains the Driver Development Kit for EIP-130 hardware.
This document contains unpack and install instructions and the pointers
to the documentation.


Package Content
---------------

The package top-level contains the following files and directory:
- BSD_LICENSE.txt               BSD license agreement
- READ_ME_FIRST.txt             this file
- DDK-130_v4.1.1                the DDK environment directory

The top-level of the DDK environment directory contains the following file
and directories:
- Config                        directory with configuration setting files
- Examples                      directory with driver modules and example
                                applications
- Integration                   directory with software components that will
                                require porting work
- Kit                           directory with standard DDK software components
- TestTools                     directory with test tools and regression
                                environment

<end-of-document>
